com.wizzer.mle.runtime

Class MleTitle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.MleTitle

  • public class MleTitle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains title generic information that is required by parts of the Magic Lantern Runtime engine. There is only one instance of this class for a given application.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MleTitle getInstance()
        Get the Singleton instance of the title.
        Returns:
        A reference to the MleTitle is returned.

      • loadGroup

        public MleGroup loadGroup(int indexToDppTOC)
                   throws MleRuntimeException
        Load the group of Actors specified by the index into the Digital Playprint's Table-of_Content.

        The mastered table of group identifiers is used to load from the DPP.

        Parameters:
        indexToDppTOC - The index into the Digital Playprint Table-Of-Content.
        Returns:
        A reference to the loaded group is returned.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the Group can not be loaded from the Digital Playprint.

      • loadScene

        public MleScene loadScene(int indexToDppTOC)
                   throws MleRuntimeException
        Load the Scene at the specified TOC index location.
        Parameters:
        indexToDppTOC - The index into the Digital Playprint Table-Of-Content.
        Returns:
        The loaded Scene is returned.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified Scene can not be loaded from the Digital Playprint.
